code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec minimum_cost(source :: String.t, target :: String.t, original :: [char], changed :: [char], cost :: [integer]) :: integer
  def minimum_cost(source, target, original, changed, cost) do
    map_changes = Enum.zip(original, changed) |> Enum.zip(cost) |> Enum.group_by(fn {{o, _}, _} -> o end, fn {{_, c}, c_cost} -> {c, c_cost} end)
    
    source
    |> String.to_charlist()
    |> Enum.with_index()
    |> Enum.reduce_while(0, fn {s_char, idx}, acc ->
      t_char = String.at(target, idx) |> String.to_charlist() |> hd()
      
      if s_char == t_char do
        {:cont, acc}
      else
        case map_changes[s_char] do
          nil ->
            {:halt, -1}
          
          changes ->
            case Enum.find(changes, fn {c, _} -> c == t_char end) do
              nil -> {:halt, -1}
              {_, c_cost} -> {:cont, acc + c_cost}
            end
        end
      end
    end)
  end
end
